attributes.action: Ban the use of fireworks unless under license or at public displays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fireworks are now being sold in October, and we the general public, wildlife and outdoor pets, are subjected to constant noise, attack, and an unsafe environment.  Gunpowder should not be freely available at any time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
